trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around June 14th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out to the backyard to have a smoke girlfriend asks me if i see strange lights on the ground thought perhaps it was the solar garden lights so i moved them then looked up in the sky and the stars were very dim because of cloud cover and one started moving it moved fast then slow left to right circles and then stop then move randomly all the wile doing one large circle around very wide but within my view six or seven times stoping and fading then moving again I got dizze watching it i didnt want to loose sight I thought it might be my eyes my girlfriend was totally scared i went back in to see if it was my eyes went back out same thing one turn to two to three to one same erratic circle around our roof tops it all the wile ther is cloud cover you could barely see them and once or twice there would be a flash that looked like a spot light horizontal mabye three times the whole thing i just had a hard time beliving it i still dont this isnt the first time we have seen things above us pretty crazy Last summer i had a daytime visual of two lights in the sky that were saucerlike one over the other was on the phone with a friend and was explaining what i was seeing and all of a sudden a dark cloud covered them out of nowere the skys were clear that day then last week saw a picture on coast to coast of the same thing over mnt rainer unbelivable what is going on ?
Summary: very dim very fast may have been more then one
